metadata.creator: GoodTimes Entertainment, Chalkboard Music Inc.
metadata.description:
A full soundtrack sampler of songs from the beloved or despised 2001 CGI direct-to-video film, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer & The Island of Misfit Toys; the sequel to the 1964 Rankin/Bass classic.

Sampler includes seven original (yet forgettable) songs, the classic Rudolph song performed by Tony Bennett, three score tracks (all of which done by Bruce Roberts and Diana B), and three bonus songs from 1998's Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer: The Movie; another Rudolph project the company GoodTimes produced three years preceding this film.

To those who are curious to relive this lump of coal in action, watch the film here: Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer And The Island Of Misfit Toys : GoodTimes Entertainment, Golden Books Family Entertainment, Classic Media, Dreamworks Classics, NBCUniversal, Tundra Productions Inc. : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive

Original film and music © GoodTimes Entertainment / Golden Books Family Entertainment / Tundra Productions Inc. / Chalkboard Music Inc. / St. Nicholas Music Inc. (ASCAP)
